org.syntaxes.fortress

Class CommandHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.syntaxes.fortress.CommandHandler

  • public class CommandHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles all of the commands that the user can throw at it.
    Author:
    ABrambleNinja

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void command(java.lang.String command, java.lang.String sender)
      Logs to console that someone used a command (eventually will handle it as well)
      static java.lang.String convertArgs(java.lang.String[] args)
      Converts an array of arguments for a command to a string with spaces as a delimiter.
      static void list(User sender)
      Lists all connected users back to whoever requested (Work in progress).
      static void say(java.lang.String[] args, User sender)
      Sends a message to all users in the format: [Server] Mesage.

      • command

        public static void command(java.lang.String command,
           java.lang.String sender)
        Logs to console that someone used a command (eventually will handle it as well)
        Parameters:
        command - command that was used
        sender - String of who sent it

      • say

        public static void say(java.lang.String[] args,
       User sender)
        Sends a message to all users in the format: [Server] Mesage.
        Parameters:
        args - Array of arguments
        sender - The sender of the message (only gets logged to console)

      • list

        public static void list(User sender)
        Lists all connected users back to whoever requested (Work in progress).
        Parameters:
        sender - User who requested the list

      • convertArgs

        public static java.lang.String convertArgs(java.lang.String[] args)
        Converts an array of arguments for a command to a string with spaces as a delimiter. Mainly used for commands like ".say".
        Parameters:
        args - The array to convert
        Returns:
        The string with spaces seperating args
